# Madhuri Pawar

Madhuri Pawar (born 21 March 1993) is an Indian actress, dancer, model and television personality who appears in Marathi, Hindi and Kannada language films. She started her career as a winner of reality show Apsara Aali. As an actress, she has starred as a lead in film London Misal (2023). She also get famed for her webseries RaanBaazaar (2022) played lead character.
Madhuri pawar is one of the famous personality in India and mainly for Maharashtraâ€™s youth sensation. She is famous for her key role named "Chanda" in Devmanus 2 (2021) on Zee Marathi. She set a benchmark of cameo role for her lead character in Tujhyat Jeev Rangala.
Early life and education
Madhuri Pawar was born on 21 March 1993 into Marathi speaking family in Satara to Kalpana and Jotiram Pawar. She has a younger brother. Who has died In 2023. She kindled an interest in Dance and Acting at an early age of five and went for many dancing and acting competitions. Pawar completed her high school education at Kanya Vidyalaya. Karanje peth Satara.apart from her studies, she participated in extra curricular activities, such as dramatics, sport. She enrolled at The KITIMER at Kolhapur where she studied MBA with two specialisation, HR and system. She had experience of lecturer at architecture College for two year. Pawar decided to discontinue her job and pursue a full-time career in films and television.
Acting career
She announced her upcoming movie, Vedat Marathe Veer Daudle Saat directed and produced by Mahesh Manjrekar. She was featured in Fanjar film as well.
